title: Fell
brief_description: This experimental puppet animation has an uneasy feel reminiscent of videos made in the 90’s by Tool guitarist Adam Jones. A small wooden figure tries to stand unassisted on trembling limbs as nameless shadows flicker just out of sight. “Fell” was an outstanding contribution to the 2000 Diegesis Program. It is a surreal and beautiful work.
